SLD and SCD designs in R

```{r}
library(mixexp)
SLD(3,2)
```

```{r}
SCD(4)
```


```{r}
des <- SLD(3,3)
DesignPoints(des)
```

Pesticide Example

```{r}
library(daewr)
spc <-lm(y ~ 0 + x1 + x2 + x3 + x1:x2 + x1:x3 + x2:x3 + x1:x2:x3, data = pest)
summary(spc)
```

```{r}
qm <-lm(y ~ 0 + x1 + x2 + x3 + x1:x2 + x1:x3 + x2:x3, data = pest)
summary(qm)
```

```{r}
MixModel(pest, "y",c("x1","x2","x3"),2)
```

```{r}
MixturePlot(des=pest, mod=2)
```

```{r}
EffPlot(des=pest,mod=2,dir=2)
```
